name: Audionauts
description:
Explore various phonicscapes as one of the audionauts

Audionauts is an audiovisual sequencer, press buttons on the keyboard to trigger clips of animation and music

Please wait for the app to load, which may take a minute or two depending on your internet speed

If the sounds are out of sync please reload the page

There are some audio syncing issues when run on firefox so its advised to use other browsers

Headphones or good speakers are recommended to get good audio quality

Created by Oscar Barany http://ozbox.tv

Music by: Oscar Abela https://soundcloud.com/hesperis

Feel free to get in touch: oscarbarany@hotmail.com

Thanks for playing!
